Description:

Splinter Cell: Blacklist begins with the fact that the United States who have a military presence 
in two thirds of the countries of the world are faced with a terrorist threat from a group of 12 people. 
Sam Fisher is now the leader of the Fourth Echelon - a secret unit that reports directly to the 
president. In Splinter Cell: Blacklist he and his team must track down and eliminate terrorists in 
time to stop the countdown. 

In Splinter Cell: Blacklist will be able to use any means to achieve this task, use new skills, 
high-tech gadgets, and still be able to call strikes.

Features:

Boundless war on terror. To perform the job Sam got the latest weapons and equipment, 
as well as complete freedom of action. No matter where events unfold, whether it is the 
largest U.S. metropolitan areas or remote corners of the globe, Sam did not stop at nothing 
to find the terrorists before the country will allotted time.

Your own style of play. Splinter Cell Blacklist does not depart from the idea of Ã¢â‚¬â€¹Ã¢â‚¬â€¹the series and 
at the same time is not afraid to explore new ways to present the gameplay. Players can define
 the style of your game and be rewarded for their choices.

Ghost - for those who want to remain in the shadows, who analyzes the situation and planning 
a safe way, without leaving a trace. It is ideal for the style spies.

Assault - for those who rely on the reaction and frontal attacks. Style for those who immediately 
opened fire.

Panther - for those who are looking for the most efficient way, making a professional killing. 
Style surgically precise operations.

Advanced tools. Delete the "Engineers" with the help of new gadgets, such as improved camera 
and flexible three-rotor drone. Among the guns Sam fans will also find their favorite shocker and 
curved blade terrifying melee. Fans of stealth operations can use opportunities Sam in neutralizing 
opponents, while "Murder on the move" will allow players to destroy a group of enemies in one 
motion with surgical precision.
Create a new echelon. Received the task of the President, Sam started to create a new group - 
the team prepared to play by his rules. Anna Grimsdottir - operational leader, a CIA agent Isaac 
Briggs is responsible for fire support, completes the list of hacker Charlie Cole. With unlimited 
resources and the latest technologies, including its own plane refitted invisibility "Paladin" 
detachment "fourth tier" is ready to perform the task of any complexity.

Rate high technology. Interface strategic operations on board the "Paladin" monitors events 
occurring around the world, in real time, so that Sam and his team will be able to learn about 
the events immediately after they occurred. This will allow access to details on the operation 
still approaching the target. "Paladin" is also a center for access to all game content, including 
cooperative and competitive modes. With ISO, players can use the global economic system 
of the game that allows you to completely revise and improve Sam, his suit, glasses, weapons, 
"Paladin" and much more.
